trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_000<tab>Welcome to Wachumeqimeqi, a market you might say is for the locals. But do feel free to have a look around─who knows, you may just find wares that pique your interest.

TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_010<tab>It is my wish that both customers and shop owners alike feel mutual satisfaction with their transactions in the market, that this house of countless beads may shine more brilliantly than ever.
TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_011<tab>With your help, I believe that wish will come true. I look forward to seeing what you accomplish, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_020<tab>You've accomplished all I hoped, and so much more, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Wachumeqimeqi is veritably glowing with revitalized life. Were it up to me, I'd have you remain as an artisan in these markets long-term.
TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_025<tab>Meet me at the Gleamsands! I'll be along just as soon as I find someone to stand in for me.
TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_026<tab>I hope we can all continue to rely on your support. We'll draw upon every last connection we have to make this event a reality!
TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_027<tab>By all means, go and make your rounds! The others will surely be delighted to tell you of their progress thus far.
TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_030<tab>It's another busy day here in Wachumeqimeqi, but we're always thankful for your custom.

TEXT_REGYOK6ROPLI_00896_ROPLI_031<tab>Be they neighbors or tourists, people of all cultures are brought together by commerce. You, too, are a precious bead in our necklace, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─never forget that.
